content.rendered:
Source: https://dev.bukkit.org/projects/buyheart

Hey bukkit Community,

in this thread i will describe u my plugin BuyHeart.

With this plugin installed, players on your Server will be able to buy more max health with money. You as server admin will be able to set a specific players max health to a number you want to.

Commands:

/buyheart: Buy a heart with money

/sethearts : Sets a specific player heart amount to the given number

Permissions(Note, that all of this Permissions can be changed!):

Buyheart.buy: Access to /buyheart

Buyheart.set: Access to /sethearts

Settings:

-All Messages(In Messages yml)

-All Permissions(In Permissions yml)

-Price per Heart(In Values yml)

First Start:

Don’t reload the server, you need to completly restart the Server first time using this Plugin.

!!! IT REQUIRES VAULT TO OPERATE !!!
